name: NSComparisonPredicate
desc: A specialized predicate for comparing expressions.

items.name: init(leftExpression: NSExpression, rightExpression: NSExpression, customSelector: Selector)
items.desc: Creates a predicate that you form by combining specified left and right expressions using a specified selector.

items.name: init(leftExpression: NSExpression, rightExpression: NSExpression, modifier: NSComparisonPredicate.Modifier, type: NSComparisonPredicate.Operator, options: NSComparisonPredicate.Options)
items.desc: Creates a predicate to a specified type that you form by combining specified left and right expressions using a specified modifier and options.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a predicate by decoding from the coder you specify.

items.name: var comparisonPredicateModifier: NSComparisonPredicate.Modifier
items.desc: The comparison predicate modifier for the receiver.

items.name: enum NSComparisonPredicate.Modifier
items.desc: Constants that describe the possible types of modifier for a comparison predicate.

items.name: var rightExpression: NSExpression
items.desc: The right expression for the receiver.

items.name: var leftExpression: NSExpression
items.desc: The left expression for the receiver.

items.name: var options: NSComparisonPredicate.Options
items.desc: The options to use for the receiver.

items.name: struct NSComparisonPredicate.Options
items.desc: Constants that describe the possible types of string comparison for comparison predicates.

items.name: var predicateOperatorType: NSComparisonPredicate.Operator
items.desc: The predicate type for the receiver.

items.name: enum NSComparisonPredicate.Operator
items.desc: Defines the type of comparison for a comparison predicate.
